stdout_tail:
Usage: pwsh[.exe] [-Login] [[-File] <filePath> [args]]
                  [-Command { - | <script-block> [-args <arg-array>]
                                | <string> [<CommandParameters>] } ]
                  [-CommandWithArgs <string> [<CommandParameters>]
                  [-ConfigurationName <string>] [-ConfigurationFile <filePath>]
                  [-CustomPipeName <string>] [-EncodedCommand <Base64EncodedCommand>]
                  [-ExecutionPolicy <ExecutionPolicy>] [-InputFormat {Text | XML}]
                  [-Interactive] [-MTA] [-NoExit] [-NoLogo] [-NonInteractive] [-NoProfile]
                  [-NoProfileLoadTime] [-OutputFormat {Text | XML}] 
                  [-SettingsFile <filePath>] [-SSHServerMode] [-STA] 
                  [-Version] [-WindowStyle <style>] 
                  [-WorkingDirectory <directoryPath>]

       pwsh[.exe] -h | -Help | -? | /?

PowerShell Online Help https://aka.ms/powershell-docs

All parameters are case-insensitive.
stderr_tail: The argument '-Book' is not recognized as the name of a script file. Check the spelling of the name, or if a path was included, verify that the path is correct and try again.

meta.topic:
TYTU: BOOK_TITLE_HERE — test stabilnoci
CEL: wygeneruj 3000+ sów po polsku, spójnie, bez meta.
STYL: thriller techno-finansowy, tempo, konkret, dialogi.
POSTACIE: Adam Kruk, Damian Cross, Lena Kowalska, Sterling.
SCENA: noc, deszcz, neon za oknem; Adam dostaje dowód manipulacji rynkiem.
KONIEC: cliffhanger.

LINIA 1: rozwi scen, dodaj szczegó, utrzymaj napicie.
